intro.title: What is this place?
intro.body: This App is an unoffical alternertive to the THI-App. It's created by and for Students and is not a official THI product.

developers.title: Who created it?
developers.body: The App is being developed by Neuland Ingolstadt e.V., a student club for all people interested in computer science. You can find out more about it on our website neuland-ingolstadt.de.

privacy.title: Is my data save?
privacy.body: Yes. Your information is encrypted directly on your device and then send to the THI-Servers via our proxy. Only then is it decrypted. Only the University has access to your login data.

links.data-security: Find out more about data security.

personalize.title: Personalization
personalize.themenotice: To unlock the Hackerman-Design, complete at least four CTF-challenges. To unlock them, visit here.
